-Gen

Don't work 4 me..

System:
Macbook pro 13", Primo 2011

OS X - Mountain Lion / 10.8.2

Macbook Pro Retina - OSX 10.8.2 

Unfortunately does not work. I've also made many attempts to get this damn game working but it seems extremely problematic at best. 

Thanks for the upload though!

from what i can gather mountain lion have changed a code line in their rosetta that stops older games from working with new intel macs and such, there are a few apps that can simulate the correct environment to work but i haven't tested any (wineskin and wrapper), ill see if i can patch a file in the container but will update if i can fix issue, thx
